channel.title: Decentralised on DistributedFog
channel.description: Recent content in Decentralised on DistributedFog

item.title: Computes.io
item.description: Computes.io is a mesh networked, distributed supercomputing platform powered by IPFS. Each node on the mesh network acts as both a core and kernel, meaning that each node can perform computations for other machines as well as request computations from itself and other machines. computes.io Computes.io is a distributed supercomputer mesh network. Each node on the mesh network acts as both a core and kernel — meaning that each node can perform Javascript computations for other machines as well as request computations from itself and other machines.

item.title: IPFS
item.description: InterPlanetary File System (IPFS) is a protocol designed to create a permanent and decentralized method of storing and sharing files. It is a content-addressable, peer-to-peer hypermedia distribution protocol. Nodes in the IPFS network form a distributed file system. Wikipedia IPNS IPFS has a name service called IPNS, a global namespace based on PKI, serves to build trust chains, is compatible with other NSes and can map DNS, .

item.title: PIOTRe
item.description: PIOTRe is a Personal IoT Repository that allows applications to be built on interoperable and efficient semantic database technology for deployment on lightweight IoT devices. The name PIOTRe is derived from the name Peter meaning 'stone' or 'rock' and is the foundation for personal IoT device repositories. cisco.com Architecture cisco.com PIOTRe PIOTRe is a Personal IoT Repository based on sparql2sql, sparql2stream and sparql2fed technologies.

item.title: Solid
item.description: Solid (derived from 'social linked data') is a proposed set of conventions and tools for building decentralized social applications based on Linked Data principles. The project aims to radically change the way Web applications work today, resulting in true data ownership as well as improved privacy. computes.io Apps Plume Blogging Cimba Microblogging Contacts Dokieli Article Publishing Profile Editing
